com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine

Class SpenControlTextBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine.SpenControlBase
        • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine.SpenControlTextBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable.Callback, AccessibilityEventSource, KeyEvent.Callback

    public class SpenControlTextBox
extends SpenControlBase
    This class provides methods for managing selected text objects.
    Since:
    3.0.0

    • Field Summary

      • setTouchEnabled

        public void setTouchEnabled(boolean enable)
        Enable or disable touch events for the text box control.
        Overrides:
        setTouchEnabled in class SpenControlBase
        Parameters:
        enable - Set to true to enable touch events, set to false to disable touch events.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        SpenControlBase.isTouchEnabled()

      • setEditable

        public void setEditable(boolean enable)
        Enable or disable editing in the text box control from user using keyboard.
        Parameters:
        enable - Set to true to enable editing in the text box control, set to false to disable editing in the text box control. When you disable editing, the text box control is not focusable in touch mode.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        isEditable()

      • isEditable

        public boolean isEditable()
        Check if the text box control object is editable.
        Returns:
        true – if the text box control is editable. false – if the text box control is not editable.
        Since:
        3.0.0
        See Also:
        setEditable(boolean)

      • onDraw

        public void onDraw(Canvas canvas)
        Called when a text object is drawn on the canvas. This method overrides the Android View method and is for internal use only. Do not call this method directly.
        Overrides:
        onDraw in class SpenControlBase
        Parameters:
        canvas - The Canvas instance on which objects are drawn
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • fit

        public void fit(boolean checkCursorPosition)
        fit control region according to object's size in list. This will automatically update the position of ContextMenu.
        Parameters:
        checkCursorPosition - If true, this TextBox can not move to outside on the screen.
        Setting this to false will also ensure that the TextBox can move to outside on the screen.
        Since:
        3.0.0

        public boolean onTouchEvent(MotionEvent event)
        Called when a touch event occurs in the text box control.
        Overrides:
        onTouchEvent in class SpenControlBase
        Returns:
        true – if touch event is consumed by the text box control. false – if touch event is not consumed by the text box control.

      • appendText

        public void appendText(String str)

        Parameters:

        Since:
        3.0.0

      • removeText

        public void removeText()
        Remove the text in the text box control. If there is selected text, it is deleted. Otherwise, the character at the current cursor position is deleted.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • setMargin

        public void setMargin(int left,
             int top,
             int right,
             int bottom)
        Set the specified margin for the text box control. This method is no longer being used.
        Parameters:
        left - - The left margin.
        top - - The top margin.
        right - - The right margin.
        bottom - - The bottom margin.
        Since:
        3.0.0

        Since:

      • getText

        public String getText(boolean onlySelection)
        Get the text that is displayed in the text box control.
        Parameters:
        onlySelection - – Set to true to get only the selected text, set to false to get all the text in the text box control.
        Returns:
        The text in the text box control.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • setTextLimit

        public void setTextLimit(int count)
        Set the specified allowable length for text in the text box control.
        Parameters:
        count - – The maximum text length. Set a limit value greater than or equal to zero and less than 5000.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when the count value passed is less than 0.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • getTextLimit

        public int getTextLimit()
        Get the text length allowed in the text box control.
        Returns:
        The maximum text length.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • setSelection

        public void setSelection(int start,
                int end)
        Set the specified anchor to start and the specified edge to end the text selection.
        Parameters:
        start - Position of start cursor
        end - Position of start cursor
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if the text box control is not editable.
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if start is greater than end, start is negative number or end is greater than string length of TextBox
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • selectAllText

        public void selectAllText()
        Select all the text in the text box control.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if the text box control is not editable.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • getPixel

        public int getPixel(int x,
           int y)
        Get the color at the specified location in the text box control.
        Overrides:
        getPixel in class SpenControlBase
        Parameters:
        x - The X coordinate.
        y - The Y coordinate.
        Returns:
        The color at the specified coordinate. This method returns 0 if x or y are out of bounds (negative or greater than the width or height respectively). The returned color is a non -blended ARGB value.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • setContextMenuVisible

        public void setContextMenuVisible(boolean visible)
        sets context menu's visibility.
        Overrides:
        setContextMenuVisible in class SpenControlBase
        Parameters:
        visible - context visible attribute.
        if visible is true then context menu will be displayed.
        if it's not, then context menu will be disappeared.
        Since:
        3.0.0
